00027 #ifndef __EIGEN_WRAPPERS_HPP__
00028 #define __EIGEN_WRAPPERS_HPP__
00029 
00030 #define EIGEN_DEFAULT_IO_FORMAT Eigen::IOFormat(Eigen::StreamPrecision, 0, ", ", " ", "", "")
00031 
00032 #include "Eigen/Core"
00033 #include "Eigen/Geometry"
00034 
00035 // Define a set of lightweight wrappers around Eigen datatypes used inside omegalib
00036 // wrappers use low-case names to avoid clashes with their Eigen base classes.
00037 namespace omega { namespace math 
00038 {
00040         template< size_t M, typename T = float >
00041         class vector: public Eigen::Matrix<T, M, 1>
00042         {
00043         public:
00044                 typedef Eigen::Matrix<T, M, 1> Base;
00045 
00046                 vector(): Base() {}
00047 
00048                 template< typename OtherDerived > 
00049                 vector(const Eigen::EigenBase< OtherDerived > &other): Base(other) {}
00050 
00051                 vector(const T &x, const T &y): Base(x, y) {}
00052 
00053                 vector(const T &x, const T &y, const T &z): Base(x, y, z) {}
00054 
00055                 template< typename OtherDerived, int ColsAtCompileTime >
00056                 vector(const Eigen::RotationBase< OtherDerived, ColsAtCompileTime > &r): Base(r) {}
00057 
00058                 template<typename OtherDerived >
00059                 vector(const Eigen::ReturnByValue< OtherDerived > &other): Base(other) {}
00060 
00061                 template<int N>
00062                 vector(const Eigen::Matrix<T, M, N> &other): Base(other) {}
00063 
00064                 template< typename OtherDerived >
00065                 vector(const Eigen::MatrixBase< OtherDerived > &other): Base(other) {}
00066 
00067                 vector(const T &x, const T &y, const T &z, const T &w): Base(x, y, z, w) {}
00068 
00069                 //std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os)
00070                 //{
00071                 //      return os << this->format(Eigen::IOFormat(Eigen::StreamPrecision, 0, ", ", " ", "", ""));
00072                 //}
00073         };
00074 
00076         template< size_t M, size_t N, typename T = float >
00077         class matrix: public Eigen::Matrix<T, M, N>
00078         {
00079         public:
00080                 typedef Eigen::Matrix<T, M, N> Base;
00081 
00082                 matrix(): Base() {}
00083 
00084                 template< typename OtherDerived > 
00085                 matrix(const Eigen::EigenBase< OtherDerived > &other): Base(other) {}
00086 
00087                 //matrix(const T &x, const T &y): Matrix(x, y) {}
00088 
00089                 //matrix(const T &x, const T &y, const T &z): Matrix (x, y, z) {}
00090 
00091                 template< typename OtherDerived, size_t ColsAtCompileTime>
00092                 matrix(const Eigen::RotationBase< OtherDerived, ColsAtCompileTime > &r): Base (r) {}
00093 
00094                 template<typename OtherDerived >
00095                 matrix(const Eigen::ReturnByValue< OtherDerived > &other): Base(other) {}
00096 
00097                 matrix(const Base&other): Base (other) {}
00098 
00099                 template< typename OtherDerived >
00100                 matrix(const Eigen::MatrixBase< OtherDerived > &other): Base(other) {}
00101 
00102                 matrix(const T &x, const T &y, const T &z, const T &w): Base (x, y, z, w) {}
00103         };
00104 
00106         template< int Dim, typename T = float, int Mode = Eigen::Projective, int Options = 0 >
00107         class transform: public Eigen::Transform<T, Dim, Mode, Options>
00108         {
00109         public:
00110                 typedef Eigen::Transform<T, Dim, Mode, Options> Base;
00111 
00112                 transform(): Base() {}
00113 
00114                 template<typename OtherDerived >
00115                 transform(const Eigen::EigenBase< OtherDerived > &other): Base (other) {}
00116 
00117                 template<typename OtherScalarType >
00118                 transform (const Eigen::Transform< OtherScalarType, Dim, Mode, Options > &other): Base (other) {}
00119         };
00120 
00122         template < typename Scalar >
00123         class quaternion : public Eigen::Quaternion<Scalar>
00124         {
00125         public:
00126                 typedef Eigen::Quaternion<Scalar> Base;
00127 
00128                 quaternion (const Scalar *data): Base(data) {}
00129 
00130                 template<typename Derived >     
00131                 quaternion (const Eigen::MatrixBase< Derived > &other): Base (other) {}
00132 
00133                 quaternion (const typename Base::AngleAxisType &aa): Base (aa) {}
00134 
00135                 quaternion (Scalar w, Scalar x, Scalar y, Scalar z): Base (w, x, y, z) {}
00136 
00137                 quaternion (): Base() {}
00138 
00139                 template<class Derived >
00140                 quaternion (const Eigen::QuaternionBase< Derived > &other): Base (other) {}
00141         };
00142 }; // namespace math
00143 }; //namespace omega
00144 
00145 #endif
